output_list.description: mintToken function allows attackers to increase total supply arbitrarily, aka 'token Devalue' issue.
transfer function allows attackers to transfer tokens to any address, aka 'Access Control' issue.
transferFrom function allows attackers to transfer tokens from any address to any address, aka 'Access Control' issue.
approve function allows attackers to approve any address to spend any amount of tokens, aka 'Access Control' issue.
approveAndCall function allows attackers to approve any address to spend any amount of tokens and call a function on the approved address, aka 'Access Control' issue.
